name: zillow_bulk_search
description: Search multiple locations on Zillow in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling zillow_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated location queries (e.g. 'San Francisco CA,Austin TX,Miami FL')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-test="property-card"], article[class*="property"], [class*="ListItem"] article'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const addressEl = el.querySelector('[data-test="property-card-addr"], address, [class*="address"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[data-test="property-card-price"], [class*="price"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a'); const detailText = el.textContent || ''; const bdMatch = detailText.match(/(\d+)\s*bd/i); const baMatch = detailText.match(/(\d+)\s*ba/i); const sqftMatch = detailText.match(/([\d,]+)\s*sqft/i); results.push({ address: addressEl ? addressEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', beds: bdMatch ? bdMatch[1] : '', baths: baMatch ? baMatch[1] : '', sqft: sqftMatch ? sqftMatch[1] : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { location: document.title || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
